translations: v．用虹吸管吸取（液体）：通过一个弯曲的管子将液体从一个容器转移到另一个容器，通常是利用重力和大气压。
· He siphoned the gas out of the car.
他用虹吸管把汽车里的汽油抽出来。

sentences.sentence: The waste liquid needs to be siphoned off.
Surgeons siphoned off fluid from his left lung.
sentences.translation: 外科医生用虹吸管从他的左肺吸出液体。

sentences.sentence: I siphoned the gasoline out of the car into a can.
sentences.translation: 我用虹吸管把汽车里的汽油抽到桶里。
